snippet: The move came after bloody street demonstrations on Monday, in the latest sign of the growing strength of the country’s environmental movement.
abstract: Municipal government in southwestern China suspends at least temporarily the construction of a metals factory following bloody street protests; move is the latest sign that the country's environmental movement is gathering strength.
lead_paragraph: The move came after bloody street demonstrations on Monday, in the latest sign of the growing strength of the country’s environmental movement.

headline.seo: Chinese City Suspends Factory Construction Following Protests
headline.main: Chinese City Suspends Factory Construction After Protests
headline.print_headline: China Factory Plan Halted After Protests
